sentences.sContent: My brother is living in Sydney.
It is designed on the model of the Sydney Opera House.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is designed on the model of the Sydney Opera House.
sentences.sCn: 它是仿效悉尼歌剧院设计的。

sentences.sContent: My brother has just left Sydney for a tour of the world.
sentences.sContent_eng: My brother has just left Sydney for a tour of the world.
sentences.sCn: 我哥哥刚离开悉尼去周游世界。
